channel.title: The Combobreaker Podcast
channel.description: Whether your weapon of choice is a controller, joystick, or fake plastic guitar, Combobreaker.com brings you an honest, entertaining view of all things video game related in the form of The Combobreaker Podcast. We are avid gamers who have these conversations anyway. We figured, what the hell, and decided to record our thoughts and let others hear our opinions. Our conversations are an uncensored look into the mind of the everyday gamer. So enjoy the show and don't take it so seriously, they're only games, right? Send your feedback and questions to podcast[at]combobreaker.com.
channel.itunes:summary: Whether your weapon of choice is a controller, joystick, or fake plastic guitar, Combobreaker.com brings you an honest, entertaining view of all things video game related in the form of The Combobreaker Podcast. We are avid gamers who have these conversations anyway. We figured, what the hell, and decided to record our thoughts and let others hear our opinions. Our conversations are an uncensored look into the mind of the everyday gamer. So enjoy the show and don't take it so seriously, they're only games, right? Send your feedback and questions to podcast[at]combobreaker.com.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Video game related reviews, opinions, and more!
channel.itunes:author: Combobreaker.com
channel.itunes:keywords: nintendo, 80's, video, game, retro, t-shirt, 8-bit, 360, playstation, wii, review
